resources.string: Joined efforts of Mail.Ru Group and OpenStreetMap make the most useful application for travelers!

MAPS.ME offers the fastest offline maps of all the cities, all countries of the world. Travel with full confidence: wherever you are, MAPS.ME helps to locate yourself on the map, find the nearest restaurant, hotel, bank, gas station etc. It doesn’t require internet connection.

We are always working on new features and would love to hear from you on how you think we could improve MAPS.ME. If you have any problems with the app, don't hesitate to contact us at support@maps.me. We respond to every request!

Do you like MAPS.ME and want to support us? There are some simple and absolutely free ways:

- post a review at your App Market
- like our Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme
- or just tell about MAPS.ME to your mom, friends and colleagues :)

Thank you for being with us. We appreciate your support very much!

P.S. We take map data from OpenStreetMap, a mapping project similar to Wikipedia, which allows users to create and edit maps. If you see something is missing or wrong on the map, you can correct the maps directly at http://openstreetmap.org, and your changes will appear in MAPS.ME app with the next version release.
Allow us to collect usage statistics to improve the app
Hope you enjoy using MAPS.ME! If so, please rate or review the app at the App Store. It takes less than a minute but can really help us. Thanks for your support!
Are you sure you want to continue?
To book the hotel, please enable your Internet connection
We need to move your bookmarks to internal memory, but there is no available space for them. Please free up the memory, otherwise bookmarks won’t be available.

Hi,

I pinned: %1$s at MAPS.ME, world offline maps. Click this link %2$s or this one %3$s to see the place on the map.

Thanks.
Hey, check out my pin at MAPS.ME map!
Hey, check out my pin at MAPS.ME! %1$s or %2$s Don\'t have offline maps installed? Download here: http://maps.me/get

You have no bookmarks yet.\nTap on any place on the map to add a bookmark.\nBookmarks from other sources can also be imported and displayed in MAPS.ME. Open KML/KMZ file with saved bookmarks from e-mail, Dropbox or weblink.
Bookmarks from other sources can be imported and displayed in MAPS.ME. Open KML/KMZ file with saved bookmarks from mail, Dropbox or weblink.
Sorry, Map Storage settings are currently disabled.
Please check your settings and make sure your device is connected to the internet.
No WiFi connection. Do you want to continue with mobile data?
An error occurred while searching for your location. Check that your device is working properly and try again later.
Current location is unknown. Maybe you are in a building or in a tunnel.
Your device doesn\'t support Location Services
Unable to create route due to an application error.
Please adjust your starting point or your destination.
A more optimal route that crosses the edge of this map is available.
Please stay alert and safe on the roads!
— Exercise caution with routes in border zones: the routes created by our app may sometimes cross country borders in unauthorized places;
— The map might be inaccurate and the suggested route might not always be the most optimal way to reach the destination;
— Road conditions, traffic laws and road signs always take priority over the navigational advice;
— Suggested routes are to be taken only as recommendations;
When following the route, please keep in mind:
Would you like to download the map and create a more optimal route spanning more than one map?
Download and update all map and routing information along the projected path to calculate route.
Download and update all map along the projected path to calculate route.
Download the map to create a more optimal route that crosses the edge of this map.
Route was not created. Unable to locate the destination.
Unable to create route. Current GPS coordinates could not be identified.
Would you like to create a more direct route that spans more than one map?
Please check your GPS signal. Enabling Wi-Fi will improve your location accuracy.
Unable to locate current GPS coordinates.
Unable to locate current GPS coordinates. Enable location services to calculate route.
Please select a destination point located closer to a road.
Please select a starting point closer to a road.
Route was not created. Unable to locate starting point.
Please disconnect USB cable or insert memory card to use MAPS.ME
Download the country of your current location
Download has failed, touch again for one more try
Download the country of your current location (%s)
You can download the map\nof your current location.
The map of your current\nlocation (%s) is up-to-date
You can update the map\nof your current location.
Download the map for your location
Download a current location map on your iPhone
Download the map of the place where you are
Download by using a cellular network connection?
This could be considerably expensive with some plans or if roaming.
Before you start let us download general world map into your device.\nIt needs %s of data.
Download the country you are searching on (%s)
Downloaded (%s), touch to update or delete
All map edits will be deleted together with the map.
To delete map please stop navigation.
To create a route, you need to update all maps and then plan the route again.
Download maps to search location and use navigation offline.
Downloading %s. You can now\nproceed to the map.
Country download is in progress now.
We will make sure to send your comments to the map editors.
You made an editing mistake. Please correct it or switch to simple mode.
Your suggested changes will be sent to the OpenStreetMap community. Describe the details which cannot be edited in MAPS.ME.
You’ve changed the world map. Do not hide this! Tell your friends, and edit it together.
This is your second map improvement. Now you are number %d in the map editors rating. Tell your friends about it.
You’ve improved the map, tell your friends about it, and edit the map together.
Your suggested changes have been sent
Pull the map to select the correct location of the object.
This shows the number of your suggested changes on the map that are currently accessible only on your device.
Please describe the problem in detail so that the OpenStreeMap community can fix the error.
Or do it yourself at http://www.openstreetmap.org/
Enter company, organization or individual responsible for the facilities.
You have added an object whose category we do not support yet. It will appear on the map in the future.
The email client has not been set up. Please configure it or use any other way to contact us at %s
Enter the email address you used during registration and we will send you the link to reset your password.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t parse latitude or longitude.
Enter a phone number without letters
Buildings at highest of 25 levels can be edited
SD card/USB storage with downloaded maps is not available
Search and navigate everywhere in the world offline, free of charge.
Please free some space on your device first in order to download %s
Please free %1$s on your device first in order to download %2$s
GPS is disabled. Please enable it in Settings.
Due to changes in Android 4.4, we need to optimize map data storage, but there is no enough space to copy map data.\n\nPlease free up the memory, otherwise maps will be available in read-only mode.
Map data storage has been optimized. Please restart the app.\n\nMapsWithMe folder in the root of SD card is not needed anymore, you can delete it.
Your map storage is being optimized now. Please wait, it may take a few minutes.
Bookmarks upload failed. The file may be corrupted or defective.
Bookmarks loaded successfully! You can find them on the map or on the Bookmarks Manager screen.
You currently have all Location Services for this device or application disabled. Please enable them in Settings.
Enable access to geolocation in the device settings
Log in and edit objects on the map, and we will make them available for millions of users. Let’s make the world better together.
Log in so other users can see the changes you have made

This applications uses geographical data (including maps, business listings, points of interest, borders of countries and regions, etc.) taken from the OpenStreetMap project. We do not warrant any consistency, accuracy, completeness or applicability of the OpenStreetMap data.
Select the place where maps should be downloaded to
Marked for downloading, touch to cancel
An object can\'t be located here
Download current map and delete the old ones
To download, you need more space. Please, delete unnecessary data.
We are transferring your downloaded maps from MAPS.ME Lite to MAPS.ME. It may take a few minutes.
Your maps failed to transfer. Please delete MAPS.ME Lite and download the maps again.
Your downloaded maps are successfully transferred to MAPS.ME.

Hi,

I'm here now: %1$s. Click this link %2$s or this one %3$s to see the place on the map.

Thanks.
Hey, check out my current location at MAPS.ME map!
Hey, check out my current location at MAPS.ME! %1$s or %2$s Don\'t have offline maps? Download here: http://maps.me/get
Updating is not allowed during navigation.
Please free some space on SD card/USB storage first in order to use the app
Not enough memory to launch app
The map for your location is not downloaded
In order for you to use navigation and the other app functions, MAPS.ME needs access to your geoposition.
To receive the latest maps, get updates notifications
Download the maps for the desired area once, and use the navigation and search functions without an internet connection.
MAPS.ME — use the maps of the entire world without an internet connection
Plan optimal car and pedestrian routes, even if there is no internet connection!
Plan optimal car and pedestrian routes.
You will never get lost again
Navigation is available only from your current location.
Do you want us to plan a route from your current location?
Enter the name as on the sign or nameplate
Recent track shows your traveled path.
Please select the time range of saving the track.
Use Google Play Services to get your current location
Full version of MAPS.ME is free today! Download now and tell your friends.

The amenity has gone or never existed. This is an auto-generated note from MAPS.ME application: a user reports a POI that is visible on a map (which can be a month old), but cannot be found on the ground.
Thank you for using MAPS.ME. Please rate the app. Your feedback helps us improve our product.
Thank you, we will do our best!
Any idea how we can make it better?
Click g+ to tell your friends about the app.
Share any ideas or issues so we can improve the app for you.
Tap a star to rate our app.
Please note: activation of this function causes increased battery usage.

Creating routes in MAPS.ME app, please keep in mind the following:

 - Suggested routes can be considered as recommendations only.
 - Road conditions, traffic rules and signs have higher priority than navigation advice.
 - The map may be incorrect or outdated, and routes may not be created the best possible way.

 Be safe on roads and take care of yourself!
Download updated map and routing data to get all MAPS.ME features.
You need to download %1$s MB, but only %2$s MB are available.
You are going to download %s MB using Mobile Data (in Roaming). This may result in additional charges, depending on your operator mobile data plan.
Routes can only be created that are fully contained within a single map.
Cannot calculate the route. No roads near your destination.
Additional data is required to create the route. Download data now?
Internal error occurred. Please try to delete and download the map again. If problem persist please contact us at support@maps.me.
There is no route found between the selected origin and destination. Please select a different start or end point.
Cannot calculate the route. No roads near your starting point.
Current location is undefined. Please specify location to create route.
Additional data required to create routes from your location.
Please update the map to create a route
Creating a route requires all the maps from your location to destination downloaded and updated.
The new version of MAPS.ME allows creating routes from your current position to a destination point. Please update maps to use this feature.
Download the map of your current location.
Please download the map you are searching in.
You need updated maps for search function:
To start searching and creating routes, please download the map, and you will not need Internet connection anymore.

Greetings,

Attached are my bookmarks from MAPS.ME offline maps. Please open it if you have MAPS.ME installed. If not, download the app for your iOS or Android device following this link: http://maps.me/get?kmz

Enjoy traveling with MAPS.ME!
Thank you for using MAPS.ME! Do you like the app? Tell your friends about it! This is the best thanks you could give us.
I want to be the first to learn about latest news updates and promotions. I can cancel my subscription at any time.
Please subscribe me to the MAPS.ME newsletter
You don\'t need MAPS.ME Lite any more, so you can uninstall it.
Your location hasn\'t been determined yet
A hardware accelerated OpenGL is required. Unfortunately, your device is not supported.
We recommend using WiFi to download large maps
This can take several minutes.\nPlease wait…
Book a hotel from the app
When you look for a hotel, the map will show the hotels’ price category and rating.
We are testing bike navigation for the new season. Try your favorite bike route with MAPS.ME, and share your opinion with us.
Add new places to the map, and edit existing ones directly from the app.
We have significantly improved the search by address. See for yourself.
You\'ve been asking for it and we\'ve done it
We have split maps into parts. Now you can download separate regions, not whole countries.
MAPS.ME users have made 200 000 map changes. Together we are making the most detailed maps in the World. Join us!
Update all maps to use Map Editor.
Which measurement system do you prefer?
